name: directory-of-podiatrists
description: Monorepo: Next.js frontend and NestJS backend for MVP

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "SERVER,CLIENT" -c "blue,green" "cd server && pnpm run start:dev" "cd client && pnpm run dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter server build && pnpm --filter client build
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter server lint && pnpm --filter client lint
scripts.test: pnpm --filter server test && pnpm --filter client test
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter server typecheck && pnpm --filter client typecheck
